name: Jayvee Bustarde
heading: Hey! I am Jayvee, a software developer. Welcome to my personal website.
overview: I am a software developer with expertise in both frontend and backend development for complex and scalable web applications. I'm constantly eager to learn and explore new web frameworks and technologies. If you're looking for someone up for challenging requirements and happy to try new technologies, please take a look at my profile and online resume. Let's connect and discuss how I can contribute to your project!

skills.title: Backend & Database Development
skills.overview: I bring extensive experience in C# and .NET, proficiently utilizing the framework's power and flexibility to construct robust, scalable applications throughout the entire software stack.

skills.title: Web Development
skills.overview: With expertise in HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript, I create visually appealing and interactive user interfaces, incorporating modern design principles and responsive web development techniques.

skills.title: Frontend Libraries & Frameworks
skills.overview: Leveraging TypeScript, React, and Angular, I develop dynamic and feature-rich frontend applications, harnessing the power of these frameworks to deliver exceptional user experiences.

skills.title: Azure & AWS Cloud Services
skills.overview: With my experience in both Azure and Amazon Web Services, I am capable in choosing the right cloud services, deployment, and overall management of scalable applications in the cloud.

skills.title: API Development & Testing
skills.overview: I am experienced in creating web APIs, API gateways and overall API development including using tools like Mulesoft and Postman.

skills.title: CSS Libraries & Frameworks
skills.overview: Using libraries like Bootstrap and SASS, I create visually cohesive and responsive designs, ensuring cross-browser compatibility and efficient styling for enhanced user experiences.

skills.title: Node Development & Modules
skills.overview: Through tools like Node.js, NPM, and Webpack, I streamline the development process by automating tasks, managing dependencies, and optimizing performance, enabling efficient module bundling and deployment.

skills.title: Source Control & Agile Project Management
skills.overview: I effectively manage project workflows, track issues, manage code versions, collaborate with teams, and document development processes, ensuring efficient project management and documentation using Git, Jira and Confluence.

roles.title: 2022 - Present
roles.cardDetailedText: I am currently a part of a consultant team developing and maintaining software and web applications for clients across Sweden.

I developed and maintained multiple interconnected customer-facing websites, led and trained other developers, migrated legacy systems, implemented new architecture, and collaborated with onshore teams for API integration.

I created web pages following AngularJS material design, developed RESTful Web APIs, generated code-first migrations, deployed build packages to AWS cloud, and optimized existing codes to enhance system performance for the Panalitix Engager System in Australia/USA.

roles.cardSubtitle: Pointwest Innovations Corp | Quezon City, Philippines
roles.cardDetailedText: I wast part of an agile/scrum team that developed web applications, conducted code reviews, interpreted business requirements, optimized server response time, and addressed client-endorsed UAT issues for ABS-CBN's Full Internal Traffic System (FITS) and Pelican Corp's projects.

projects.title: Ticket Restaurant Touch
projects.overview: Complex migrations, process optimizations, and full SDLC for Edenred Japan's high-traffic web and mobile app.

projects.title: Engager
projects.overview: Design and development of multi tenant web-based tools and learning platform for accountants.

projects.title: Zipadoo
projects.overview: Multiple 3rd party API integrations and synchronization for pulling product inventory of client vendors.

projects.title: Paratus EMR
projects.overview: Maintenance and feature development of ambulance system for real time communication with on-call doctors.

projects.title: Project Monitor & Manager
projects.overview: Feature development of multiple interconnected websites protecting underground assets in Australia and New Zealand.
